    flextable

flextable

Source: vignettes/flextable.Rmd
flextable.Rmd
library(varnish)

Example 

table_contents <- airquality[1:10,c(6, 1:4)]
table_contents
#>    Day Ozone Solar.R Wind Temp
#> 1    1    41     190  7.4   67
#> 2    2    36     118  8.0   72
#> 3    3    12     149 12.6   74
#> 4    4    18     313 11.5   62
#> 5    5    NA      NA 14.3   56
#> 6    6    28      NA 14.9   66
#> 7    7    23     299  8.6   65
#> 8    8    19      99 13.8   59
#> 9    9     8      19 20.1   61
#> 10  10    NA     194  8.6   69

Add column headers

The add_headers() function deletes the existing table header and then adds (multiple) column headers. It is a wrapper for flextable::delete_part() and flextable::add_header_row().

table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  add_headers(v = list(c(NA, "Air quality"),
                       c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")),
              c = list(c(1, 4), NULL))

Apply style to a table

The style_table() function is used to apply an overall design to a flextable. It is recommended to use add_headers() (to add column headers) before applying this function.

table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  flextable::delete_part() %>% 
  add_headers(c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")) %>% 
  style_table()

Underline header 

table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  add_headers(v = list(c(NA, "Air quality"),
                       c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")),
              c = list(c(1, 4), NULL)) %>% 
  style_table() %>% 
  underline_header(j = 2)

Add footnotes 

table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  flextable::delete_part() %>% 
    flextable::add_header_row(values = c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")) %>% 
  flextable::add_header_row(values = c("", "Air quality"),
                 colwidths = c(1, 4)) %>% 
  style_table() %>% 
  underline_header(j = 2) %>% 
  add_footnote("Daily air quality measurements in New York, May 1973.")
table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  flextable::delete_part() %>% 
    flextable::add_header_row(values = c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")) %>% 
  flextable::add_header_row(values = c("", "Air quality"),
                 colwidths = c(1, 4)) %>% 
  style_table() %>% 
  underline_header(j = 2) %>% 
  add_footnote("Daily air quality measurements in New York, May 1973.") %>% 
  add_footnote("\u00B0F",
               i = 2, j = 5, part = "header",
               symb = marker(1))

Set widths of all columns 

table_contents %>% 
  flextable::flextable() %>% 
  flextable::delete_part() %>% 
    flextable::add_header_row(values = c("Day", "Ozone", "Solar.R", "Wind", "Temp")) %>% 
  flextable::add_header_row(values = c("", "Air quality"),
                 colwidths = c(1, 4)) %>% 
  style_table() %>% 
  underline_header(j = 2) %>% 
  add_footnote("Daily air quality measurements in New York, May 1973.") %>% 
  colwidths(c(10, 23, 23, 23, 23))
